sent.orig: Virgil: Fight! Right now! Do it! Fight goddammit! Fight! Fight! Fiiiiight!
sent.trans: 维吉尔：战斗！现在就去！去吧！该死的战斗！战斗！战斗！战斗！

sent.orig: Have a food or cake fight or even a pillow fight.
sent.trans: 扔蛋糕咋可以忘记呢！睡觉前还得枕头大战！

sent.orig: The third rule of fight club, someone yells stop limp, taps out, the fight is over.
sent.trans: 搏击俱乐部第三个规则，有人叫停，放松，轻拍对方，战斗结束。

sent.orig: Tyler: The first rule of fight club is, you do not talk about fight club.
sent.trans: 战斗俱乐部第一个规则是，您不许谈论战斗俱乐部。

sent.orig: Nevertheless, in northern China we should still fight hard, fight with all our mightall we can.
sent.trans: 但是华北方面，我们还要力争，凡能争得者应用全力争之。
